text:
[Verse]
Whispers in the dark heart
Shadows dance around start
Moonlight plays its part art
Lost souls don't depart far

[Verse 2]
Footsteps on the old street
Echoes where the night meets
Heartbeats in a slow heat
Dreams they never complete

[Chorus]
Dreams they never complete
Night and day they repeat
Echoes in the night sweet
Chasing what we'll never meet

[Verse 3]
Stars flicker in the sky high
Questions linger why try
Memories that won't die fly
Echoes breathing a sigh cry

[Bridge]
Time turns but won't heal steel
Old wounds we conceal feel
Hold on with a thin zeal
Echoes whisper unreal real

[Chorus]
Dreams they never complete
Night and day they repeat
Echoes in the night sweet
Chasing what we'll never meet
title: Echoes in the Night
